trans-unit.source: Provides an object list adapter for the mobile XHTML adapter set.
trans-unit.target: 提供行動 XHTML 配接器集的物件清單配接器。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱<see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站</see> (機器翻譯)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlObjectListAdapter> class can be used by mobile control developers to display an <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> control on new devices or for new markup standards.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlObjectListAdapter>類別可以由行動控制項開發人員用來顯示<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>開啟新的裝置，或新標記標準控制。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Control and Adapter Interaction](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c330dabc-7e28-40bc-b777-101a5c6fa982).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[控制項和配接器互動](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c330dabc-7e28-40bc-b777-101a5c6fa982)。

trans-unit.source: for operating in a hosted environment.
trans-unit.target: 用於裝載環境中的作業。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求值：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />，權限值：<see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlObjectListAdapter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlObjectListAdapter" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱<see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站</see> (機器翻譯)。

trans-unit.source: A string constant used in postback event arguments to indicate whether the user should be returned to the list view.
trans-unit.target: 字串常數，用在回傳事件引數中指出使用者是否應返回到清單檢視。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱<see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站</see> (機器翻譯)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlObjectListAdapter.BackToList> field, which is the value "__back", is used by mobile control developers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlObjectListAdapter.BackToList>欄位中，也就是 「 __back"的值，由行動控制項開發人員使用。

trans-unit.source: Returns a strongly typed reference to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 傳回關聯控制項的強型別參考。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱<see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站</see> (機器翻譯)。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to bind the templated UI to the underlying <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示將範本化 UI 繫結至基礎 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Called by a control to create a templated user interface (UI) if device templates are defined.
trans-unit.target: 如果定義了裝置樣板，則由控制項呼叫，以建立樣板化使用者介面 (UI)。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱<see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站</see> (機器翻譯)。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.CreateTemplatedUI%2A> method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.IControlAdapter.CreateTemplatedUI%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method of the corresponding control adapter, which in turn can either call back the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.CreateTemplatedItemsList%2A> method or the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.CreateTemplatedItemDetails%2A> method for the control, or create its own device-specific templated UI.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.CreateTemplatedUI%2A>方法呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.IControlAdapter.CreateTemplatedUI%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>對應的控制項配接器，這又可以回到呼叫的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.CreateTemplatedItemsList%2A>方法或<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.CreateTemplatedItemDetails%2A>方法控制項，或建立自己裝置特定樣板化的 UI。

trans-unit.source: Name of the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if the event was handled.
trans-unit.target: 如果事件已處理，則傳回 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱<see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站</see> (機器翻譯)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the event was handled; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果事件已處理則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by a control when it receives a postback event notification, to check whether the event is adapter-specific.
trans-unit.target: 收到回傳事件通知，檢查事件是否為特定的配接器時，是由控制項呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: If the control implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler> method and receives a postback event, the <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler.RaisePostBackEvent%2A> method of the control adapter is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項實作<xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler>方法，並接收回傳的事件，<xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler.RaisePostBackEvent%2A>呼叫方法的控制項配接器。

trans-unit.source: If events sent to the control can vary depending on the target device, the control implementation of this method must call the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ControlAdapter.HandlePostBackEvent%2A> method of the control adapter.
trans-unit.target: 如果事件傳送至控制項可能會不同，視目標裝置而定，必須呼叫這個方法的控制項實作<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ControlAdapter.HandlePostBackEvent%2A>的控制項配接器的方法。

trans-unit.source: This method returns `true` or `false`, indicating whether the device adapter handled the event.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回`true`或`false`，這表示裝置配接器是否處理事件。

trans-unit.source: It returns `false` by default.
trans-unit.target: 它會傳回`false`預設。

trans-unit.source: the postback data is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 回傳資料無效。

trans-unit.source: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" /> control contains any commands.
trans-unit.target: 傳回布林值，指出 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" /> 控制項是否包含任何命令。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱<see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站</see> (機器翻譯)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" /> has one or more commands; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" /> 具有一個或多個命令則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" /> control contains a default command.
trans-unit.target: 傳回布林值，指出 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" /> 控制項是否包含預設命令。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱<see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站</see> (機器翻譯)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" /> contains a default command; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" /> 包含預設命令則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether a list item can display all fields of an item.
trans-unit.target: 傳回布林值，指出清單項目是否可以顯示項目的所有欄位。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱<see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站</see> (機器翻譯)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if all fields of a list item can be displayed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以顯示清單項目的所有欄位則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlObjectListAdapter.HasItemDetails%2A> method indicates that the item needs a details view in order for the user to see all the data.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlObjectListAdapter.HasItemDetails%2A>方法表示的項目必須是詳細資料檢視，讓使用者看到的所有資料。

trans-unit.source: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" /> control contains a default command and no other commands.
trans-unit.target: 傳回布林值，指出 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" /> 控制項是否只包含預設命令而不含其他命令。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱<see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站</see> (機器翻譯)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" /> has a default command and no other commands; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" /> 只含有預設命令而不含其他命令，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: An object (defined by <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />) that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: (由 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> 所定義的) 物件，包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Called prior to rendering the control.
trans-unit.target: 在呈現控制項之前進行呼叫。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱<see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站</see> (機器翻譯)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter" /> used to render the server control content on the client's browser.
trans-unit.target: 用來在用戶端的瀏覽器中呈現伺服器控制項內容的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: Renders the control on the page using the provided <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用提供的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter" />，呈現頁面上的控制項。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱<see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站</see> (機器翻譯)。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListItem" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListItem" />。

trans-unit.source: Renders the details of the specified item.
trans-unit.target: 呈現指定項目的詳細資料。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱<see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站</see> (機器翻譯)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlObjectListAdapter.RenderItemDetails%2A> method is called during rendering for the details view of the specific item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlObjectListAdapter.RenderItemDetails%2A>詳細資料檢視中的特定項目轉譯期間會呼叫方法<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: Renders the list of items in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 呈現 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" /> 控制項中的項目清單。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱<see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站</see> (機器翻譯)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlObjectListAdapter.RenderItemsList%2A> method is called during rendering to render each item in the list.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlObjectListAdapter.RenderItemsList%2A>來呈現清單中的每個項目轉譯期間會呼叫方法。

trans-unit.source: A string constant used in postback event arguments to indicate whether the list should jump to the first item beyond the currently visible items.
trans-unit.target: 字串常數，用在回傳事件引數中指出清單是否應移至目前可見項目外的第一個項目。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱<see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站</see> (機器翻譯)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlObjectListAdapter.ShowMore> field, which is the value "__more", is used by mobile control developers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlObjectListAdapter.ShowMore>欄位，"__more 」 是此值，由行動控制項開發人員使用。

trans-unit.source: A string constant used in postback event arguments to indicate that the browser should jump to a specific item in the list.
trans-unit.target: 字串常數，用在回傳事件引數中表示瀏覽器應移至清單中的特定項目。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱<see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站</see> (機器翻譯)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlObjectListAdapter.ShowMoreFormat> field, which is an internal field and has the value "__more*n*", where `n` is a number, is created during rendering.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlObjectListAdapter.ShowMoreFormat>欄位，也就是內部的欄位，且具有值"__more*n*"，其中`n`是數字，會在轉譯期間建立。

trans-unit.source: This field is used like the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlObjectListAdapter.ShowMore> field, except that it specifies the index of the item to display in details view.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位的使用方式類似<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlObjectListAdapter.ShowMore>欄位中，不同之處在於它會指定要在詳細資料檢視中顯示之項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlObjectListAdapter.ShowMoreFormat> field is used by mobile control developers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlObjectListAdapter.ShowMoreFormat>欄位由行動控制項開發人員。
